about.title: About the Project
about.first-paragraph: LocalStack Web was born out of the need for an intuitive visual interface to manage AWS services locally during development.
about.second-paragraph: With this tool, developers can visualize and interact with services like S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, and others more efficiently.
about.third-paragraph: The project uses Vue.js 3 with Vuetify to create a modern and responsive experience, making it easier to work with LocalStack.
about.fourth-paragraph: The interface allows you to monitor resources, perform operations, and debug applications without relying solely on the command line.
about.collaboration: This project is open source and welcomes community contributions. Feel free to report bugs, suggest improvements, or contribute code.
